Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-11053 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.11.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-11053 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.11.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.11.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-11053
